content.content: Post most results of stress tests under a variety of scenarios including black swan events. Include frequency & severity ratings.
content.GPT-summary: The post presents the results of stress tests conducted under various scenarios, including black swan events. The author is not asking for feedback, explaining the proposal, advertising it, or collaborating with others. The post is not a discussion but rather a presentation of the stress test results. It may be of interest to third parties who are auditing and reviewing the proposal.
